features.featureTitle:
Update the centralized video lessons content source to use the user-provided YouTube URLs for the existing Video Lessons items by setting `videoUrl` values in `frontend/src/content/videoLessons.ts`.

Assign the four provided URLs to the first four existing lessons (in the same order as listed by the user):
1) `speaking-confidence`
2) `youtube-getting-started`
3) `tiktok-getting-started`
4) `presentation-skills`

Keep the remaining lessons (`content-planning-youtube`, `tiktok-trends`) unchanged (their `videoUrl` may remain undefined) unless additional URLs are provided later.

When saving the URLs, preserve the exact user-provided URLs while ensuring the stored string does not include accidental whitespace characters that would break the link when opened (e.g., trim any leading/trailing spaces).
